segments.text: That sink overflowing is just gross; water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle—how can she not feel that mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wiping a plate while ignoring the flood; unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies on a dirty stool—filthy habits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the jar; who knows how clean that is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for treats like that; it's almost too eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down cabinets—ruining everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slippery and nasty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open window letting in fresh air, but inside it's a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up; this kitchen needs a deep clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies? More like spreading crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks tidy, unlike this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of stepping in that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a revolting lack of awareness all around.
segments.speaker: PAR
